paper_abstract: We prove the logical independence of a complexity-theoretic and a statistical randomness property of sequences over a finite field. The two properties relate to the linear complexity profile and to the infinity-distribution of sequences, respectively. The proofs are given by constructing counterexamples to the presumed logical implications between these two properties. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The independence of two randomness properties of sequences over finite fields
